overview: Ken MacLure brings to Litl more than 20 years of experience in manufacturing and supply chain operations. Prior to Litl, Ken served on the executive team of Colubris Networks, a successful start-up acquired in 2008 by Hewlett-Packard. Earlier in Ken’s career, he was also vice president of operations for Convergent Networks, and director of operations for Nortel Networks’ Aptis Communications. Ken holds a Bachelor of Science in Electrical Engineering Technology (BSEET) degree from Roger Williams University in Bristol, RI.
